title: ResampleImage
description: ResampleImage is a tool used to resample images to specified sizes and spacings, using various interpolation methods and pixel types.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: Dimension of the image to be resampled.

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: The image file to be resampled.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The output image file after resampling.

size_spacing.title: Size and Spacing
size_spacing.description: Resampling size and spacing specification, e.g., 'MxNxO'.

interpolate_type.title: Interpolation Type
interpolate_type.description: Specifies the interpolation type. 0: linear (default), 1: nearest-neighbor, 2: gaussian, 3: windowedSinc, 4: B-Spline.

pixeltype.title: Pixel Type
pixeltype.description: Specifies the pixel type of the output image. 0: char, 1: unsigned char, 2: short, 3: unsigned short, 4: int, 5: unsigned int, 6: float (default), 7: double.
